title: How to convert human audible sound to ultrasonic sound - Quora

response.answer_text: By using a device called a Frequency Shifter. There are software based ones like Ableton Live, but I don’t know if it is capable of shifting up to ultrasonic. You will probably need to do a web search for hardware based systems. What are you trying to do, anyway? Try to end up with your voice in a range only your dog can hear? Output transducers will be a problem - you will likely end up with a piezo-electric device and while these are good in Ultrasonic Cleaners, they don’t produce much volume in free space (i.e. air).
